      Home Details for 13915 Marble Creek Ct

      <1 Days on Trulia
      You'll Fall in Love w/ this Magazine Picture Perfect Custom Kickerillo Home located on an intimate cul-de-sac. Accents include:spacious foyer w/floating staircase,oak hardwoods,tile w/granite inlays,arched doorways,molding,3 fireplaces,plantation shutters,cathedral ceilings,art niche, conversational granite island kitchen open to den,Sub-Zero,convection oven,great size rooms,gorgeous grounds w/ample space for pool,extended garage & 2 car port cochere. Lots like this are scarce so don t wait!

      This Single-Family Home located at 13915 Marble Creek Ct, Houston TX, 77077 is currently for sale. This property is listed by Dietrich Properties for $815,000. 13915 Marble Creek Ct has 4 beds, 3 ½ baths, and approximately 4,479 square feet. The property has a lot size of 0.36 acres and was built in 1999. 13915 Marble Creek Ct is in the Eldridge- West Oaks neighborhood in Houston and in ZIP Code 77077. The list price of $815,000 is 91% higher than the average list price of $426,101 for Eldridge- West Oaks real estate, 96% higher than the average list price of $416,715 for 77077 real estate, and 103% higher than the average list price of $401,024 for Houston, TX real estate.
